isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REMOVE - COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

svcproc.title: COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

note.para: Except for the PTO gears, the left and right countershaft assemblies are identical and disassembled in the same manner.

svcproc.para: Move the right countershaft assembly to the rear as far as possible so the front of the shaft can be removed from the case bore and moved to the center of the case ( Figure 84). Lift the assembly from the case and repeat the procedure for the left countershaft assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 84. Move Right Countershaft Assembly to Rear
